'''House Grandison''' is a vassal house from [[the Stormlands]] that holds fealty to [[House Baratheon]]. Their sigil is a black sleeping [[Lions|lion]] on a yellow field.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Grandison is a vassal house sworn to [[Storm's End]]. Their seat is Grandview and their words are "Rouse Me Not". Ser [[Jaime Lannister]]'s predecessor in the [[Kingsguard]] of [[Aerys II]] was Ser Harlan Grandison, an old [[knight]] who died in his sleep at the [[White Sword Tower]]. The current head of the family is Lord Hugh Grandison, an old man dubbed Greybeard.
sections.History:
[[File:BattleOfSummerhall.jpg|thumb|300px|The Battle of Summerhal, notice the sleeping lion of Grandison to the right of the image]]
House Grandison was one of the three loyalist houses that defied their liege lord, [[Robert Baratheon]], at the beginnings of [[Robert's Rebellion]]. Along with two other noble houses, House Grandison was defeated at the [[Battle of Summerhall]] in the course of a single day.<ref>[[The Stormlands (Histories & Lore)]]</ref>
